Module GraphicsPlayground
Package pizza

Class MenuPizza

java.lang.Object
pizza.Pizza
pizza.MenuPizza
All Implemented Interfaces:
MenuItem, Bases, Cheeses, Sauces
public class MenuPizza extends Pizza implements MenuItem
MenuPizza provides a selection for ordering pre-organised Pizzas from the menu. The menu pizza's toppings can not be changed.

  • Method Details

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns the human-readable string representation of this Menu Pizza.

      The format of the string to return is: 

           [MenuPizza] $Pizza [$NumToppings]
      Where:
      • $Pizza toString of the Pizza superclass
      • $NumToppings is the number of toppings on the pizza
      For example: 
          [MenuPizza] Hawaiian: is a 'MEDIUM' sized base with 'TOMATO' sauce and 'MOZZARELLA' cheese - Toppings: [PINEAPPLE, HAM] [2]
      Overrides:
      toString in class Pizza
      Returns:
      string representation of this Custom Pizza
